title: Pakistan releases 20 Indian fishermen on completion of sentences
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 20 (APP): Pakistan on Monday released 20 imprisoned Indian fishermen after they had completed their sentences.
The said fishermen have been repatriated to India via Wagah Border, according to the Foreign Office spokesperson.
The spokespersons said that given the humanitarian nature of the prisonersâ€™ issue, Pakistan also expected the Government of India to reciprocate the gesture in the same spirit.
